document_data.mainbody:
Nightmare lullaby was a spell used by bards.
This spell allowed the caster to place a targeted creature into a sleepwalking nightmare. The targeted creature became confused. The creature had to be within  of the caster for the spell to be effective. This range grew as the casters skill level increased.
This spell required only verbal and somatic components.
This spell was found in Volume III of A Harpers Companion.
